did.unittitle: Postcard to Martha Van Meter from Dorthy C.; Greek Christmas card from Lily Stephens

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Postcard reads "Aloha from Kauai" and depicts Waialua Falls. Greek Christmas card design displays "Kala Christougena" in Greek with a colorful picture of a ship and what appears to be faint doodles (circles as little faces for the "sailors" on the ship). The inner message text is in English.
